pages.text: Mystery packs are a collectors best friend, turning a pack that would normally only have 4 cards into one with 9. They will always give 9 cards, with 2 of them being shiny variants. The rates are the same as all normal packs. $(br2)Mystery packs are also the only way to get packs that are from unloaded or discontinued mods, since they can give cards from every set.
Mystery packs can be quite expensive though, requiring various hard to aquire materials.
